title: A Knight Templar abroad; or, Reminiscences of travel beyond the sea
author: Cord, W. Harlan.
snippet: The writer, also, met him face to face, on ChapelStreet, in New Haven, on the next morning afterhis reading, which was given on his last visit toAmerica, in March, 1869. Next, you see the present King Humbert, of Italy, and his father, Victor
